original_text:
On the day of the festival of our king
    the princes become inflamed with wine,
    and he joins hands with the mockers.
korean_text: 우리 왕의 날에 지도자들은 술의 뜨거움으로 병이 나며 왕은 오만한 자들과 더불어 악수하는도다

sentences.original_text: On the day of the festival of our king
the princes become inflamed with wine
and he joins hands with the mockers
